name: Uncheck AI
description: Uncheck AI offers an AI checker and humanizer to scan and make AI-generated content undetectable, serving users with tools to enhance text for various applications.
longDescription: Uncheck AI is a platform that provides an AI detector to check the humanness of text and an AI humanizer to create 100% undetectable AI content. It aims to help users make AI-generated text, such as from ChatGPT or GPT-4, undetectable by popular AI detectors like GPTZero and Turnitin. The tool simplifies the process with a three-step method: entering AI text, rewriting, and getting undetectable output. It also ensures spam-free, SEO-friendly results and removes ChatGPT watermarks easily, catering to users needing high-quality, human-like content.
features: Offers an AI checker that instantly gets detection scores from multiple popular AI detectors like GPTZero and Copyleaks.
Provides an AI humanizer that creates 100% undetectable content, tested with 99%+ human scores.
Removes ChatGPT watermarks in one click, identifying and replacing special watermarking phrases.
Ensures error-free outputs with no grammar or syntax mistakes in rewritten text.
Guarantees true-to-original meaning, preserving ideas and messages without distortion.
Produces plagiarism-free content, ensuring originality and authenticity in every piece.
Generates spam-free, SEO-friendly outputs suitable for email marketing and search engine rankings.
Supports multiple languages including English, Español, Français, and others for global accessibility.
Humanizes over 4 million words per day, trusted by over 12 million users.

faqs.question: What is an AI humanizer?
faqs.answer: An AI humanizer makes AI-generated text undetectable by popular AI detectors, creating human-like content.

faqs.question: How does the AI checker work?
faqs.answer: The built-in AI checker instantly gets detection scores from tools like GPTZero and Copyleaks with one click.

faqs.question: Can Uncheck.ai remove ChatGPT watermarks?
faqs.answer: Yes, it removes ChatGPT watermarks in one click by identifying and replacing special phrases.

faqs.question: Is the output SEO-friendly?
faqs.answer: Yes, the humanized text is spam-free and search engine friendly, preventing penalties for AI-generated content.

faqs.question: Does it support multiple languages?
faqs.answer: Yes, it supports languages like English, Español, Français, and more.

faqs.question: How many words can it humanize daily?
faqs.answer: It humanizes over 4 million words per day.

faqs.question: Is the tool free to use?
faqs.answer: It offers a free built-in AI checker, but pricing details for other features are not specified.

faqs.question: What AI writing tools does it work with?
faqs.answer: It works with tools like ChatGPT, GPT-4, Claude, Jasper, and Copy.ai.

faqs.question: How accurate is the AI detection?
faqs.answer: It is tested with 99%+ human scores, ensuring high accuracy.

faqs.question: Can it handle large volumes of text?
faqs.answer: Yes, it processes high volumes, humanizing over 4 million words daily.
